snippet: Gov. John R. Kasich, a Republican, said he would seek to expand the Medicaid program in Ohio to cover several hundred thousand more adults with incomes up to 138 percent of the poverty level.
abstract: Ohio Gov John R Kasich says he will seek to expand state Medicaid program to cover several hundred thousand more adults with incomes up to 138 percent of poverty level.
lead_paragraph: Gov. John R. Kasich, a Republican, said he would seek to expand the Medicaid program in Ohio to cover several hundred thousand more adults with incomes up to 138 percent of the poverty level.

headline.seo: Ohio Governor John R. Kasich Will Seek to Cover More Under Medicaid
headline.main: Ohio: Governor Will Seek to Cover More Under Medicaid
headline.print_headline: Ohio: Governor Will Seek To Cover More Under Medicaid
